methods.void addRegions(TextureAtlas atlas): Adds all named texture regions from the atlas.
methods.void dispose(): Disposes the TextureAtlas and all Disposable resources in the skin.
methods.String find(Object resource): Returns the name of the specified style object, or null if it is not in the skin.
methods.ObjectMap getAll(Class type): Returns the name to resource mapping for the specified type, or null if no resources of that type exist.
methods.TextureAtlas getAtlas(): Returns the TextureAtlas that resources in this skin reference, or null.
methods.void load(FileHandle skinFile): Adds all resources in the specified skin JSON file.
methods.Drawable newDrawable(Drawable drawable): Returns a copy of the specified drawable.
methods.Drawable newDrawable(Drawable drawable,: Returns a tinted copy of a drawable found in the skin via getDrawable(String).
Returns a tinted copy of a drawable found in the skin via getDrawable(String).
methods.Drawable newDrawable(String name): Returns a copy of a drawable found in the skin via getDrawable(String).
methods.Drawable newDrawable(String name, Color: Returns a tinted copy of a drawable found in the skin via getDrawable(String).
methods.Drawable newDrawable(String name, float: Returns a tinted copy of a drawable found in the skin via getDrawable(String).
methods.void setEnabled(Actor actor, boolean ena: Sets the style on the actor to disabled or enabled.
